00058   int  gDelay = 0;
00059   bool gVerbose = false;
00060   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00061   const char *usage[] = {
00062     "usage: sampleServer [OPTIONS]",
00063     "",
00064     "OPTIONS:",
00065     "  --connect-to=<addr>  Connect to a client listening on <addr> (TCP only)."
00066     "  --help          Display this help text and exit",
00067     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to listen on (default=11255)",
00068     "  --app-queue     Use an application queue for handling requests",
00069     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00070     "  --delay=<ms>    Specifies milliseconds to wait before echoing message (default=0)",
00071     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00072     "  --verbose,-v    Generate verbose output",
00073     ""
00074     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00075     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00076     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00077     (const char *)0
00078   };

00085   class RequestHandler : public ApplicationHandler {
00086   public:
00087 
00088     RequestHandler(Comm *comm, EventPtr &eventPtr) : ApplicationHandler(eventPtr), m_comm(comm) { return; }
00089 
00090     virtual void run() {
00091       m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00092       CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(m_header_builder, m_event_ptr->messageLen) );
00093       cbufPtr->append_bytes((uint8_t *)m_event_ptr->message, m_event_ptr->messageLen);
00094       int error = m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbufPtr);
00095       if (error != Error::OK) {
00096         HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00097       }
00098     }
00099   private:
00100     Comm *m_comm;
00101     HeaderBuilder m_header_builder;
00102   };
00103 
00104 
00109   class Dispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00110 
00111   public:
00112 
00113     Dispatcher(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueue *appQueue) : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue(appQueue) { return; }
00114   
00115     virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00116       if (gVerbose && eventPtr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00117         HT_INFO("Connection Established.");
00118       }
00119       else if (gVerbose && eventPtr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00120         if (eventPtr->error != 0) {
00121           HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(eventPtr->error));
00122         }
00123         else {
00124           HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00125         }
00126       }
00127       else if (eventPtr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00128         HT_WARNF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(eventPtr->error));
00129       }
00130       else if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00131         if (m_app_queue == 0) {
00132           m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(eventPtr->header);
00133           CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(m_header_builder, eventPtr->messageLen) );
00134           cbufPtr->append_bytes((uint8_t *)eventPtr->message, eventPtr->messageLen);
00135           if (gDelay > 0)
00136             poll(0, 0, gDelay);
00137           int error = m_comm->send_response(eventPtr->addr, cbufPtr);
00138           if (error != Error::OK) {
00139             HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00140           }
00141         }
00142         else
00143           m_app_queue->add( new RequestHandler(m_comm, eventPtr) );
00144       }
00145     }
00146 
00147   private:
00148     Comm             *m_comm;
00149     ApplicationQueue *m_app_queue;
00150     HeaderBuilder     m_header_builder;
00151   };
00152 
00153 
00154 
00159   class UdpDispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00160   public:
00161 
00162     UdpDispatcher(Comm *comm) : m_comm(comm) { return; }
00163 
00164     virtual void handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00165       if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00166         m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(eventPtr->header);
00167         CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(m_header_builder, eventPtr->messageLen) );
00168         cbufPtr->append_bytes((uint8_t *)eventPtr->message, eventPtr->messageLen);
00169         if (gDelay > 0)
00170           poll(0, 0, gDelay);
00171         int error = m_comm->send_datagram(eventPtr->addr, eventPtr->localAddr, cbufPtr);
00172         if (error != Error::OK) {
00173           HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00174         }
00175       }
00176       else {
00177         HT_ERRORF("Error : %s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00178       }
00179     }
00180 
00181   private:
00182     Comm           *m_comm;
00183     HeaderBuilder   m_header_builder;
00184   };
00185

00191   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00192   public:
00193     HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) : m_dispatch_handler_ptr(dhp) { return; }
00194 
00195     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00196       dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00197     }
00198 
00199   private:
00200     DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00201   };
00202 
00203 }

00209 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00210   Comm *comm;
00211   int rval, error;
00212   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00213   int reactorCount = 2;
00214   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfPtr;
00215   ApplicationQueue *appQueue = 0;
00216   bool udp = false;
00217   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00218   struct sockaddr_in localAddr;
00219   struct sockaddr_in clientAddr;
00220 
00221   memset(&clientAddr, 0, sizeof(clientAddr));
00222 
00223   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00224     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))
00225       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00226     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--app-queue")) {
00227       appQueue = new ApplicationQueue(5);
00228     }
00229     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--connect-to=", 13)) {
00230       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&clientAddr, &argv[i][13]))
00231         HT_ABORT;
00232     }
00233     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00234       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00235       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00236         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00237         exit(1);
00238       }
00239       port = (uint16_t)rval;
00240     }
00241     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00242       reactorCount = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00243     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--delay=", 8))
00244       gDelay = atoi(&argv[i][8]);
00245     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00246       udp = true;
00247     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00248       gVerbose = true;
00249     else
00250       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00251   }
00252 
00253   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00254   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactorCount);
00255 
00256   comm = new Comm();
00257 
00258   if (gVerbose) {
00259     cout << "Listening on port " << port << endl;
00260     if (gDelay)
00261       cout << "Delay = " << gDelay << endl;
00262   }
00263 
00264   InetAddr::initialize(&localAddr, "localhost", port);
00265 
00266   if (!udp) {
00267     dhp = new Dispatcher(comm, appQueue);
00268     
00269     if (clientAddr.sin_port != 0) {
00270       if ((error = comm->connect(clientAddr, localAddr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00271         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00272         exit(1);
00273       }
00274     }
00275     else {
00276       chfPtr = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00277       if ((error = comm->listen(localAddr, chfPtr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00278         HT_ERRORF("Comm::listen error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00279         exit(1);
00280       }
00281     }
00282   }
00283   else {
00284     assert(clientAddr.sin_port == 0);
00285     dhp = new UdpDispatcher(comm);
00286     error = comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&localAddr, dhp);
00287   }
00288 
00289   poll(0, 0, -1);
00290 
00291   delete comm;
00292   return 0;
00293 }
